intro: Randia standleyana, commonly known as the yellow randia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its opposite, ovate leaves and clusters of small, yellowish-white flowers. It produces small, spherical fruits that contain several seeds. Randia standleyana is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is used in traditional medicine in some regions.
